title: Low Priority Que
body: So i used to afk alot of games purely cause i just didn't care as much and have never tried contacting riot about lifting the que wait time. I am currently on 20min waits again as i had to leave a game for family issues that occurred and was wondering if there is an email that i can contact to try and get rid of this que time. I have had the messages pop up from riot saying good work on not leaving games as often which i havent in a long time i think now. So if anyone had an email that i could message or knows of a way that i can go about getting rid of this wait time please send help :)

replies.body: [Unfortunately you are unable to be removed from LPQ under any circumstances.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ#h3q6)
yay just what i wanted to hear
